description:
Jimmy – AI Project Manager Agent

Jimmy is an AI agent that performs every task a human project manager can:

1:1 Team Conversations: Chats with individual members to gather real-time updates on what they’ve worked on

Role-Based Management: Adds and organizes team members by role (engineering, marketing, etc.)

Automated Reporting: Generates comprehensive team reports on demand or on a schedule

Custom Check-Ins: Creates daily, weekly, reflective or mental-health check-ins to boost morale and productivity

Open Interaction: Team members can talk to Jimmy freely for updates, prompts, and encouragement

Use Jimmy to streamline coordination, stay on top of progress, and support your team’s well-being—all through a single AI agent.
problem_solved:
Our AI solves three core pain points in team management:

Visibility Gaps & Status-Chasing: Instead of hunting down updates, Jimmy conducts 1:1 conversations and instantly compiles real-time progress into clear, actionable reports.

Meeting Overload: By automating daily/weekly standups and reflective check-ins, it slashes time spent in status meetings—freeing teams to focus on building.

Full Assistance & Productivity Reporting: Jimmy assists you end-to-end, generating detailed reports on each team member to pinpoint strengths, surface blockers, and boost overall productivity.
favorite_part: My favorite part is the 1:1 conversational update flow—Jimmy chatting directly with each team member to pull real-time progress and blockers. It takes the most tedious, friction-filled task off your plate and turns raw updates into instantly actionable insights.
